summary: Website/app UI and membership flow: refine Secretary lookup flow, adjust navbar branding colors/hover states, and change "Get Started" to trigger member login then switch to a user profile menu when authenticated.

existing_features.title: Update the top navigation bar branding colors: keep using the existing teal logo SVG, render the “Whisper” wordmark text in white, and render all menu item labels in white by default with teal styling on hover/rollover and when selected/active.

Change the header “Get Started” CTA behavior so that when the user is not authenticated it triggers Internet Identity login (becoming a site member) rather than scrolling to a page section or initiating instance creation/chat flows.

When the user is authenticated, replace the header “Get Started” CTA with a user profile entry that shows the user’s profile image (fallback if none) and label, and opens a submenu with at least: “Profile” (navigates to /profile) and “Logout” (logs out and clears cached queries).

Refine the Secretary “lookup/discovery” flow to avoid auto-navigation side effects and make the outcome explicit: after the user selects state + county or city, show a clear result message and present explicit next-action buttons (e.g., “View existing instance” when found, or “Create an instance proposal” when not found), without automatically navigating after a timeout.

new_feature_requests.summary: Navbar branding styling: keep logo teal; set Whisper text and menu items white; teal on hover/selected
Change "Get Started" to open member login (not instance activation/chat)
After login, replace "Get Started" with user profile image/name and submenu

projectName: Refine Secretary lookup flow and update navbar membership CTA + branding colors
